content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I understand you need HVAC service. May I please have your full name to get started?
Thanks, George! Can you please provide the address where the HVAC service is needed?
Thank you. I'm checking if we cover that area now.
Great news, 123 Maple Street is within our service area. When would you prefer our technician to visit? Please suggest a date and time.
How about tomorrow afternoon, say between 1 and 3 pm?
Thanks, I'll check our availability for tomorrow between 1 and 3 pm.
I'm sorry, but we don't have any availability tomorrow afternoon between 1 and 3 pm. Would you be open to another day or time?
No, that's really the only time I can manage. Can you give me an estimate on cost instead?
I will get you a price estimate for the HVAC service at your address.

Unfortunately, an accurate price estimate requires an in-person evaluation by our technician. Since you're unable to schedule a different time, I regret that we can't proceed with your request at this moment. If your availability changes, please contact us again. Thank you for considering XYZ Home Services.
reason: No suitable appointment time available and price estimate requires visit
